sentences.en: Cold - blood vertebrate has formatted multi - cold adaptation artifice in the various habitation environment.
sentences.cn: 冷血脊椎动物在多种多样栖息环境中形成多种耐寒策略.

sentences.en: Existing houses are becoming totally unfit for human habitation.
sentences.cn: 现有的房子正变得完全不适合住人。

sentences.en: I believe that co - habitation makes young blood more successful.
sentences.cn: 我相信同居会使年轻人更成功.

sentences.en: In this place ten miles around there is no signs of human habitation.
sentences.cn: 在这一地方的十英里的周围内杳无人烟.

sentences.en: Let their habitation desolate; and let none dwell in their tents.
sentences.cn: 愿他们的住处,变为荒场. 愿他们的帐棚,无人居住.

sentences.en: Signs of habitation appeared and the fields gave way to houses.
sentences.cn: 屋宇起平地，耕野生人烟。

sentences.en: The broken - down old house was not fit for human habitation.
sentences.cn: 这栋破烂的老房子不适合人居住.

sentences.en: The house was declared unsafe for habitation.
sentences.cn: 那屋子被宣布为不宜居住的危房.

sentences.en: The housing was unfit for human habitation .
The recent survey found that 20 per cent of private-rented dwellings are unfit for human habitation.
sentences.cn: 最近的调查发现，20%的私人租住房屋并不适合人居住。

sentences.en: Their habitation was not merely respectable and commodious, but even dignified and imposing.
sentences.cn: 他们的居所既宽敞舒适又尊严气派.

sentences.en: Then there is rest around the lonely figure, now laid in its last earthly habitation.
sentences.cn: 这时候,那具孤零零的尸体已经进了尘世上最后的安息之所,寂静笼罩着他.

sentences.en: There was no sign of habitation as far as the eye could see.
These houses are not fit for human habitation.
sentences.cn: 这些房子不适于人居住.

sentences.en: These islands are on the margins of human habitation.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿位于人类聚居地的边缘。

sentences.en: They looked around for any signs of habitation.
sentences.cn: 他们四处寻找有人居住的迹象。

trans.tran_en: a building that is unfit for human habitation is not safe or healthy for people to live in
